column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I understand this is a touristy place so that's probably why I am getting this vibe.  One thing I didn't like though was that service seemed very very rushed.  As soon as we had served the last slice of pizza
column2: out waitress seemed to want us to leave soon.  All in all
column3: I enjoyed my experience but this isn't a place I would suggest making a special trip for.
